title: RBI penalises CSB Bank, Union Bank of India, others
description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has imposed penalties on five entities, including CSB Bank, Union Bank of India, and Muthoot Housing Finance, for non-compliance with regulatory norms. The penalties are based on deficiencies in regulatory compliance and are not intended to pronounce upon the validity of any transaction or agreement entered into entities.
